alert.note: Alert for Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:43PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR HUDSON...QUEENS...BRONX...RICHMOND...KINGS...NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) AND SOUTHWESTERN NASSAU COUNTIES... At 343 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ozone Park, or near Crown Heights, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. This severe storm will be near... Flushing around 350 PM EDT. Jamaica and Kennedy Airport around 355 PM EDT. Valley Stream and Woodmere around 400 PM EDT. Lynbrook and Great Neck around 405 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
